mapper.sql: FIELD_NAME, RTV_OID, DETAIL_LINE_SEQ_NO, LOCATION_LINE_SEQ_NO, FIELD_TYPE, INT_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, STRING_VALUE, BOOL_VALUE,DATE_VALUE
mapper.insert: insert into RTV_LOCATION_DETAIL_EXTENDED (FIELD_NAME, RTV_OID,DETAIL_LINE_SEQ_NO, LOCATION_LINE_SEQ_NO, FIELD_TYPE, INT_VALUE, FLOAT_VALUE, STRING_VALUE, BOOL_VALUE,DATE_VALUE) values (#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtvOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailLineSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{locationLineSeqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fieldType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{intValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{floatValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stringValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boolValue,jdbcType=BIT},#{dateValue,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
